name: Starcraft II: Heart of the Swarm - Collector's Edition
summary: Contains: Starcraft II: Heart of the Swarm PC/Mac Game // Exclusive Behind The Scenes DVD & Blu-Ray Two-Disc Set // Collector's Edition Soundtrack // Heart of the Swam Art Book // Zerg Rush Mouse Pad // Starcraft II: Torrasque Ultralisk & Portraits (exclusive in-game content) // World of Warcraft: Pet Baneling (exclusive in-game content) // Diablo III: Blade Wings and Banner Sigil (exclusive in-game content)
